contents: 1. fol. 1b-38a: Ifhām fī sharḥ bāb waqf ḥamzah wa-Hishām.
2. fol. 40b-49b: Durrah al-muḍīʼah fī qirāʼāt al-aʼimmah al-thalāthah al-marḍīyah.
3. fol. 50b-52a: Arbaʻūn masʼalah min masāʼil muskhilah.
4. fol. 52b-53b: Bāb mā kharaja min al-hamz ʻan al-qiyās fī al-rasm.
7. fol. 60-63a: ʻUmdat al-mujīd fī al-naẓm wa-al-tajwīd.
8. fol. 63b-110a: Mufīd fī sharḥ ʻUmdat al-mujīd fī al-naẓm wa-al-tajwīd.
10. fol. 111b-124a: Sharḥ al-Wāḍiḥah fī tajwīd al-Fātiḥah.
11. fol. 125b-130a: Nathr al-durar fī maʻrifat madhāhib al-aʼimmah al-sabʻah bayna al-suwar.
13. fol. 133b-140a: Tamyīz fī maʻrifat aqsām al-alifāt fī kitāb Allāh al-ʻazīz.
15. fol. 147b-151a: Ghāyat al-murād fī maʻrifat ikhrāj al-ḍād.

title.@value: [Nathr al-durar fī maʻrifat madhāhib al-aʼimmah al-sabʻah bayna al-suwar ... etc.].

subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
